A technique used by [[shinobi]] to unseal what was sealed within a scroll, or in the anime, a sheet of paper.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', this technique is referred to as '{{translation|''Weapon Summoning'''|武器は口寄せ|Buki wa Kuchiyose}}.
